stories.text: I didn't expect how hard it was to search it on google. All I got were "top x crawler"/"scrape with 1 click"/"scrapy". Is it bad SEO or something?
stories.title: Can you search “Common Crawl” on Google with keywords only?

stories.text:
I use quite a few bookmarklets on my desktop browsers. However, bookmarklets have serious usability issues on a mobile device, if work at all.

On Android, there is the nice little app called URL Forwarder by David Laurell: https://f-droid.org/en/packages/net.daverix.urlforward/ that can save the day.

My question is: Is there an equivalent App on iOS that can do the same, which is to forward an URL and optionally the title, to another website with the proper encoding and formatting? A naive search on the Apple app store yield nothing.
stories.title: Ask HN: Bookmarklet App for iOS?
